basic.description: An advanced inter-disciplinary course studying the anatomy, pharmacology and physiology of the cardiovascular system at the molecular and cellular level. The course is comprised of lectures, discussion and student seminars based on recent literature. Winter term, 3 hour seminar. S.C. Pang. Equivalent of  CRSS-456. PREREQUISITE: Undergraduate degree in Life Science or equivalent or permission from department. EXCLUSIONS: ANAT-853*, PHAR-853*, PHGY-853*, CRSS-456.
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Cellular and Molecular Cardiovascular Sciences
